item.title: Whispering Context: Distilling Syntax and Semantics for Long Speech Transcripts
item.description: arXiv:2508.13376v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: ASR systems often struggle with maintaining syntactic and semantic accuracy in long audio transcripts, impacting tasks like Named Entity Recognition (NER), capitalization, and punctuation. We propose a novel approach that enhances ASR by distilling co...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> API, arxiv, model, embedding, context | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>

item.title: Saudi-Dialect-ALLaM: LoRA Fine-Tuning for Dialectal Arabic Generation
item.description: arXiv:2508.13525v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Large language models (LLMs) for Arabic are still dominated by Modern Standard Arabic (MSA), with limited support for Saudi dialects such as Najdi and Hijazi. This underrepresentation hinders their ability to capture authentic dialectal variation. Usi...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> arxiv, model, instruction, large language model, release | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
